product_name: Coleman Fold 'N Go Two Burner Stove
long_description: The Coleman(R) Fold 'N Go two-burner stove is approximately 25% more compact than traditional two-burner stoves, for easy portability! Although smaller, it is every bit as powerful, delivering 10,000 BTUs per side, the same power rating as many Coleman stoves. Each burner is fully adjustable from a fine simmer to all-out boiling and frying temperatures. The 13-inch spread between burners accommodates large skillets and pots, making the stove perfect for camping, picnics and patio usage. Chrome-plated heavy-gauge wire grates support a variety of pot sizes; aluminized steel cooking surfaces make clean-up a cinch. Plus, the electronic ignition brings push-button ease to lighting burners, which in turn are easily managed by dual control knobs. Uses standard 16.4-ounce propane cylinders (not included); features a pressure regulator for consistent performance thoughout the life of the cylinder. Due to flammable item shipping restrictions, we cannot sell fuel canisters online; they are available at REI retail stores.
short_description: The Coleman(R) Fold 'N Go two-burner stove is approximately 25% more compact than traditional two-burner stoves, for easy portability!
